about_the_game:
What happens when you are a 2D creature that has been given the ability to move between the layers that make up your universe? Well... you start solving puzzles of course!

Get ready to think in 3D to solve interesting puzzles where the main focus is interacting with the different layers of the level, or prove your puzzle-design capabilities by creating your own levels with the Level Editor!

Gameplay Features


Move Between Layers!

By moving forwards or backwards you can travel between different layers of the level to interact with the elements that are found there. In this game the background isn't just for show, it is a physical part of the level!

Cool Boxes!

Sometimes life can get pretty lonely... but luckily you have some boxes to keep you company! These boxes can be pushed around, and not only in 2D! You can move them between different layers or push even them out of the map!

Movable Platforms!

What kind of puzzle would it be if we didn't have some buttons and platforms? Use your body or a friendly box to press buttons that activate platforms that move into a specific position, and it's completely wireless!

And even more Coming Soon!
More features and elements will be added until the release of the game, so stay tuned for when they're ready to show!

Level Editor

The game features a full-fledged Level Editor that can be used by anyone to expand the limits of what's possible in this universe, are you up to the challenge?

name: Divemensions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Celeron J1900
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel i5-7300U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Divemensions is a 2D Puzzle Platformer.... just that the levels are not actually 2D! In this game you'll need to move between the layers of the world to overcome various challenges! Get ready to solve puzzles by understanding the 3D layout of the levels or create your own with the level editor!
